name: Anarchy OnLine: The Notum Wars
text: One of last year's most controversial MMORPGs returns. Once all the programming issues are resolved, however, Anarchy OnLine truly presents itself as one of the more interesting games in this now crowded genre. Our RPGPlayer experts took advantage of the landing on Italian soil of The Notum Wars, Anarchy OnLine's expansion (but also containing the original game), to write a detailed review of the Funcom title. Full review
